column1: {{book

'''''The 1992 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[Ballantine Books]] on [[25 July]] [[1991]]. It features art by [[Ted Nasmith]] based on ''[[The Hobbit]]'', ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and ''[[The Silmarillion]]''.
__NOTOC__
